mapper.update: UPDATE PARKING SET ARRIVAL_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE PARKING_NO =#{parkingNo} AND DEL_YN ='N'
UPDATE PARKING SET DEPARTURE_TIME =SYSDATE WHERE PARKING_NO =#{parkingNo} AND DEL_YN ='N'

UPDATE UNIT SET VEH_TIME = ( SELECT VEH_TIME FROM UNIT WHERE UNIT_NO = #{unitNo} ) - ( SELECT TO_NUMBER( EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (DEPARTURE_TIME - ARRIVAL_TIME) DAY TO SECOND)) AS FEE FROM PARKING WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parkingNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' )
UPDATE PARKING SET DEL_YN = 'Y' ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parkingNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PARKING_NO ,UNIT_NO ,PURPOSE ,CAR_NO ,TO_CHAR(ARRIVAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ARRIVAL_TIME ,TO_CHAR(DEPARTURE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DEPARTURE_TIME ,TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DATE ,DEL_YN FROM PARKING WHERE UNIT_NO =#{unitNo} AND DEL_YN ='N' ORDER BY PARKING_NO DESC

SELECT PARKING_NO ,UNIT_NO ,PURPOSE ,CAR_NO ,ARRIVAL_TIME ,DEPARTURE_TIME ,TO_NUMBER( EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (DEPARTURE_TIME - ARRIVAL_TIME) DAY TO SECOND)) AS FEE FROM PARKING WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parkingNo} AND DEL_YN ='N' ORDER BY PARKING_NO DESC
